column4: I need help... when I am using some of applications on GNOME, it does not have the same theme as that I am using, is there anyone can help me?
is it firefox?
no... it is synaptic
and qt4 too
it was ok until the certain point (I am not sure exactly until when)... but it was changed
ok.. wait a minute
AHA!!! It is OK now
maybe the theme you choose isn't complete?
but qt4 still has the same problem
I am using, clearlooks-more gtk2 theme
I know.. it is KDE based
however... it was ok before I reinstall ubuntu system
it is not using plastik theme... it is...
just like very old fashion gnome theme
just for your reference, I am using... ish (control) + clearlooks-more (border) + tango (icon) combination
are you still there?
can I ask you little more help please?
hmmm....
but... it was OK
I don't know what made it changed like that... any idea?
not all theme can be applied to all type of application, for example gnome theme on X applications
I guess so...
thank you for your help.. I appreciate it
have a nice day :-)
